organic_results.title: Recruiting faculty and students
organic_results.snippet: Differences in salaries among academic institutions are the most important factor governing the formal qualifications of their faculties. But independent of these material rewards, the intrinsic rewards provided by specialized and advanced academic work also facilitate recruitment of well qualified faculties, and so does the academic tradition that has developed in older institutions. Most conditions that help recruiting qualified faculties also attract highly able students to a college or university. Thus large institutions have better faculties and …
